title: Motiva - Sans Serif typeface
content:
Currently working on an identity for a Human Resources company, I decided to take a lettering made for them and extend it into a complete typeface. Here is the first draft of it. The name Motiva, as I have shallowly researched, is not used for a typeface yet.  
Here is the PDF.  
 [Motiva Sans 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20090714061719/http:/www.rodrigosaiani.com.br/motiva-sans.pdf)
author: rosaiani
